channel.title: Ahmed Madbouly's Blog
channel.description: A developer in a lifelong journey seeking after truth.

item.title: Building a Tic-Tac-Toe AI with Javascript
item.description:
When we say the word game in the context of AI we usually donâ€™t mean it in the sense of entertainment games, instead we refer to a more general definition of a game:

A game is a multi-agent environment in which agents compete and/or cooperate on some specific task(s) while meeting some specific criteria. An agent is referred to as a player.

With this general definition we could see that a situation, like driving your car to a specific place, is a game. In such a situation, you (as a...
